main.title: 1st Place
contents: $4000 cash
Amazon Echo Dot with Clock (Gen 4) for each team member
Anker Powercore+ USB-C Charger for each team member

main.title: 2nd Place
contents: $2000 cash
$50 Redballon Voucher for each team member
Amazon Echo Dot (Gen 3) for each team member

main.title: 3rd Place
contents: $1000 cash
Kaiser Baas Drones for each team member

category.title: Best Design
category.description: Awarded to the most usable and best looking user interface
contents: Adobe Creative Cloud subscriptions for each member

category.title: Most Creative Idea
category.description: The project that has the most original idea or reinvention
contents: Wacom Tablets for each member

category.title: Best Social Impact
category.description: The best idea that addresses one of the UN Sustainable Development Goals, or another pressing issue in our society today
contents: Wacoco Minipresso NS (and sustainable Nespresso pods) for each team member

sponsor.title: The Greatest Makers
sponsor.description: The project that offers the most innovative solution through experimentation, iterative learning and discovery
contents: Arcitecta swag pack worth over $300 for each member. Includes a sleek mechanical keyboard, a drop-proof laptop bag, and an sustainably-sourced and locally-printed Arcitecta hoodie.

sponsor.title: The Data Analytics Prize
sponsor.description: Calling all data lovers! We are looking for compelling insights derived from data. Incorporate data analytics and visualisation incorporated as part of your final solution and as part of the pitch.
contents: Garmin Forerunner 45s Sports Watch
Jabra Elite 75t True Wireless In-Ear Headphones
Fitbit Versa 2 Smart Fitness Watch

sponsor.title: The Creative Pitch Prize
sponsor.description: We are looking for the most compelling and quality pitch! Tell us your story, sell your idea to us and don't be afraid to get creative and incorporate other digital tools and technology!
contents: Sennheiser HD 458BT Over-Ear Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
Ryze Tello Drone Boost Combo
Logitech G PRO X Mechanical Gaming Keyboard

sponsor.title: Community Prize
sponsor.description: For the hack that helps the community the most
contents: $100 gift cards for each team member

sponsor.title: Best User-Centric Hack
contents: $150 Bellroy voucher for each team member

sponsor.title: Best IoT Hack
sponsor.description: The most innovative idea that best utilises the benefits of the Internet of Things
contents: An Arduino IoT Starter Kit

sponsor.title: Customer Obsessed
sponsor.description: Inspiring customers through best value food and drink solutions to make lives easier
contents: Coles Gift Cards to the value of $1800 for the team

sponsor.title: Best use of Twilio
sponsor.description: For the hack that best makes use of the Twilio API
contents: AirPods for each team member

sponsor.title: Best use of EchoAR
sponsor.description: The best app that used EchoAR for their augmented or virtual reality (AR/VR) application
contents: $50 Amazon Gift Card for the team
3-month free Business Tier access for each team member
